item.title: Quick post on Bayes Theorem
item.author: example@mail.com (JamiA97)
item.description: Bayes Theorem $$P(A|B) = \frac{P(B|A) \cdot P(A)}{P(B)}$$ Where: ( P(A|B) ): The probability of event ( A ) occurring given that ( B ) has occurred (this is called the “posterior”). ( P(B|A) ): The probability of event ( B ) occurring given that ( A ) has occurred (called the “likelihood”). ( P(A) ): The prior probability of event ( A ) occurring (before we know ( B )). ( P(B) ): The total probability of event ( B ) occurring (the normalizing constant, which accounts for all possible ways ( B ) could happen).

item.title: Reminder how to start hugo
item.author: example@mail.com (JamiA97)
item.description: Simply type ‘hugo server’ in the command window

item.title: Simple Web App Development Tech Stack
item.author: example@mail.com (JamiA97)
item.description: Simple Web App Development Tech Stack Stack Components Use vanilla HTML Use JavaScript - Access external libraries as needed. Use SQLite for database actions. Use Node.js for server actions. Use Git/GitHub for version control. Project Structure Project ├── package.json ├── package-lock.json ├── public │ ├── index.html │ ├── script.js │ └── styles.css ├── database.db └── server.js Testing will be done locally on an Ubuntu laptop using Firefox or Chrome. Files will be edited using VSCode.

item.title: Using vim with Markdown
item.author: example@mail.com (JamiA97)
item.description: Using VIM for editing Markdown. Markdown can be edited with VIM with the correct plugins: plasticboy/vim-markdown: Provides syntax highlighting. dhruvasagar/vim-table-mode: Adds table formatting features. mzlogin/vim-markdown-toc: Automatically generates tables of contents for md files. vim-polyglot: Provides language support for Markdown. iamcco/markdown-preview.nvim: Allows preview of markdown files in a browser. Live. To preview the markdown live use ‘:MarkdownPreview’
